thread.title: Unions square off with Macron as French strikes resume

title: Unions square off with Macron as French strikes resume
text:
Unions square off with Macron as French strikes resume 11:54am EDT - 01:45 
Travellers have been grappling with a wave of transport strikes across France as union anger over President Emmanuel Macron's economic reforms continues to grow. As Ciara Lee reports, the latest dispute is the biggest challenge yet to Macron's attempts to modernise the French economy
